title: My Que currently broken? wth
body:
is anyone else getting this issue or is it just me?

went to Que up for some normals little while ago and while waiting for it to find me a match it would randomly say i missed the responce to accept Que match without actually giving me the option to accept or decline it. It happening every time now even after i reset both the client and my computer, and it gave me both a 6 minute Que dodge ban, and a 15 minute one.

I just want to play some league omfg


edit: after the timer runs out im switching back to legacy client and trying again cause this is BS.

replies.body: so i think i may of fixed it but only due time will tell. aperently when i upgraded my router after black friday the new router needed port forwarding for league hopefully that worked

so i got it to work eventually (for a bit) however the problem still occurs once in a while, also it does not let me use legacy client anymore either, for some nothing happens when i click legacy client on login screen.

this is really starting to annoy me cause its happening again and i have no idea why, my friend sees the Que pop but it doesnt show me it.

I've seen this issue a few times before and it's always caused by a poor connection to the PvP.net service (matchmaking, social). I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all local network settings are compatible with League before we move forward with troubleshooting.

Let me know if this caused any change.
